name: ALL Chess
description:
If you find any bugs or requirements, you can leave a message in the STEAM community
I will continuously optimize this game

Create, collect, play is the heart of this board game, and we're committed to creating an online museum of playable chess!
Create your own chess game, customise the rules, pieces, board, look and feel, and enjoy a game like no other!

Game features

1) Customize the rules, pieces, board and appearance
2) 20+ preset classic board games
3) Open creative workshop, upload your creations and play with other people's ideas
4) A chess game feature that records and plays back every move you make
5) The ability to play with friends online and offline
6) reality mode, move, put and take away pieces at will, so that ideas are not bound by the program
